name: bucketwheels-withvisual
title: Bucket Wheel Excavators - with visual markers
author: Kingdud
description: Adds 3 types of large Bucket Wheel Excavators. Includes visual marker for easier placement. Originally created by Laserzwei, who is too much of a jackass to be thankful for help. All files in this zip, save thumbnail.png, BigWheelMinerSheet2.png, and HR-BigWheelMinerSheet2.png are under MIT license owned by Laserzwei. You must include the previous sentence and this one to avoid his wrath (and legit legal problems). thumbnail.png, BigWheelMinerSheet2.png, and HR-BigWheelMinerSheet2.png are not under any copyright and may be reused freely.
